channel.title: Attaching my no-ip to my server
channel.description: ok all, how do I attach my no-ip to my premade server, my no-ip: pkmad.no-ip.org, but how do i attach it to many fr33sc4p3 server source? could someone help me please. Many Thanks. James

item.title: Attaching my no-ip to my server
item.dc:creator: @X_Owner_X X Owner X
item.description:
@X_Owner_X wrote:

[quote=“m0ng00se, post:3, topic:103263”]The no-ip attaches to your network, which is how people connect to the server.[/quote]You put what i said in simpiler terms lol.
Thanks for helping correcting what I said

item.title: Attaching my no-ip to my server
item.dc:creator: @m0ng00se m0ng00se
item.description:
@m0ng00se wrote:

The no-ip attaches to your network, which is how people connect to the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Attaching my no-ip to my server

item.title: Attaching my no-ip to my server
item.dc:creator: @X_Owner_X X Owner X
item.description:
@X_Owner_X wrote:

Did you port forward?
If you did don’t worry about port forwarding.
But, you don’t attach a no-ip or ip to a server.
You just make sure it’s running and let people use it to get on.
You don’t attach it.

Read full topic
item.source: Attaching my no-ip to my server
